mapper.insert: insert into book ( bookCode, bookName, ISBN, press, src, author, edition, sortCode, sortName, shopCode, message, price, number, shopNumber, createAt, updateAt ) values ( #{bookCode}, #{bookName}, #{ISBN}, #{press}, #{src}, #{author}, #{edition}, #{sortCode}, #{sortName}, #{shopCode}, #{message}, #{price}, #{number}, #{shopNumber}, now(), now() );
mapper.select: select * from book where bookName like concat("%",#{condition},"%") or author like concat("%",#{condition},"%") or ISBN like concat("%",#{condition},"%") ;
select * from book where shopCode = #{shopCode} and exist = 1;
mapper.update: update book set bookName = #{bookName}, ISBN = #{ISBN}, src = #{src}, press = #{press}, author = #{author}, edition = #{edition}, shopNumber = #{shopNumber}, sortCode = #{sortCode}, sortName = #{sortName}, shopCode = #{shopCode}, message = #{message}, price = #{price}, number = #{number}, createAt = now(), updateAt = now() where shopCode = #{shopCode} and bookCode = #{bookCode};
update book set exist = 0 where bookCode = #{bookCode};
